interface.name: getty_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute gettys in the getty domain.

interface.name: getty_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use getty file descriptors.

interface.name: getty_read_log
interface.summary: Allow process to read getty log file.

interface.name: getty_read_config
interface.summary: Allow process to read getty config file.

interface.name: getty_rw_config
interface.summary: Allow process to edit getty config file.
